data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Curaçao, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the country of Curaçao
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the country of Curaçao.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the country of Curaçao to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, help the 10,336 believers in Curaçao to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Curaçao by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 10,336 believers in the country of Curaçao the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 10,336 believers in the country of Curaçao to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
